alt: Lee Jae-myung leader of the Democratic Party of Korea and Gyeonggi Province Governor Kim Dong-yeon (left) greet each other at the 76th anniversary of the Jeju April 3 Incident Memorial Ceremony held at Jeju April 3 Peace Park on the morning of the 3rd. Newsis
